body:
Hi, 
It might only be me, but occasionally everything will pause. I can move around but everyone else is frozen. Im not sure if this is my internet but I just wanted to say it. Also I'm not sure if this is just the update but for my bro and I, on 1.9 and later when we build up in a single tower ( e.g. Jump place block in air, Jump) And so on, it lags and occasionally I slip of the side somehow? What? anyways.Just reporting this. Thanks.

Kind Regards ExShot

title: Lag on Servers

replies.body:
This used to happen to me all the time.
It seldom happens now but  it's something that'll come and go.

Lag has been a constant problem on Avicus and the Developers are aware of the issue.

replies.body: Just don't use 1.9 and 1.10 here for a while. Use 1.8 utill lags will be fixed.
replies.body_tagged: Just don't use 1.9 and 1.10 here for a while. Use 1.8 utill lags will be fixed.

replies.body: Yeah, thats what I'm doing for now, although it still does freeze everyone and I disconnect
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, thats what I'm doing for now, although it still does freeze everyone and I disconnect

replies.body:
Then it is your Internet or computer. Or someone ddos the server.
Usually it is okey (at least for me).
